name: Mornings with Java
description:
After recently moving in, Chronos receives much needed help from his neighbour Java. As thanks, he starts spending the mornings with him. Together they learn more about each other and end up falling in love.

MORNINGS WITH JAVA is a visual novel/point and click game created in Ren'Py. Help Chronos make drinks for Java as they spend the mornings with each other.

This was really fun to create. The gameplay and story is simple with one ending. You can play through the game as slow or as fast as you desire. This doesn't have music but I hope the visuals help communicate the calm atmosphere.

Game features:
  • 5-10 minutes of play time
  • 1 ending with a simple story
  • Simple gameplay
Credits:

Story/code/art by AnizyArt

This was made for Object Head Jam 2021!
